attributes.action: Demand for Pensioners to be treated fairly
attributes.additional_details:
Those of pensionable age are now being treated by this Government as an expendable item compaired to those earning over £150k. This should be readdressed in favour of those who gave their lives etc so that MPs can even make such decsions as to treat the aged.
MPs lunch allowance per day is far in excess of what a pensioner can expect per week to live on. Greed must stop and now start from the top down.
We want MPs to live on the same allowances they say OPAs must live on.
